body:
## Coffee Time
Coffee Time is a cafe simulation casual game. As the cafe operator, you run a cafe, where you serve your customers coffee, blended drinks, cakes, and the like. The goal of the game is to serve as many customers as quickly as possible. The more customers you serve, the more points and money you get, which can be used to upgrade your cafe! As the game goes on the cafe becomes more popular and serves more customers. But be careful! With greater popularity comes greater challenge, as customers demand that you serve them quickly and exactly as you asked, and the days become longer and longer to satisfy customer demand.

![screenshots!](https://raw.github.com/iyulaev/tacotime/master/web/screenshot_collage.png)

Coffee Time is a [Coffee Cats Games](mailto:coffeecatsgames@gmail.com) production. Contact us for questions, support, or feedback at coffeecatsgames AT gmail.com.

## Download

Our first beta is available as of 2013-01-03. Download it at the link below.

[Download Coffee Time, v. 2013-01-03](https://github.com/iyulaev/tacotime/raw/master/CoffeeTime.apk) 

You can always download the full source from the [Coffee Time github project](https://github.com/iyulaev/tacotime).

## News

### 2013-01-03 - First beta released!

[Our first beta is available TODAY!](https://github.com/iyulaev/tacotime/raw/master/CoffeeTime.apk) It's been extensively tested on an HTC Incredible but should work on any 3-5" screen size smartphone. Download it, install it on your phone, and check it out.

## Privacy Policy

During game play, we collect anonymous usage statistics to help us better design future versions of the game. These include which which levels get completed, what the failure rates for each level are, and other game play stats. They are anonymous and furthermore will NEVER be sold to any third parties (not that they would be useful to anyone). The statistics are solely to help is improve future versions of our products.

## The Team

Coffee Time was programmed by a Real Programmer, with artwork by a Real Artist and music by a Real, Record-Making Musician! The game was designed by Ivan (github: [iyulaev](https://github.com/iyulaev); Ivan was responsible for managing the project as well as defining the mechanics of the game, and then translating this into a Java codebase. Megan C. created the bulk of the artwork used in the final game, and Ryan W.S. composed the Original Soundtrack used in Coffee Time.

## Source

Full source, including all game content, is available from the [Coffee Time github project](https://github.com/iyulaev/tacotime). Coffee Time is open source! Feedback on the code would be welcome, and we'd love to hear about your experience leveraging any part of the codebase!

### License

All software is released under BSD license, see the README.md for full license text.

All original artwork and all music & sound effects are released under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial (CC BY-NC) license.

Selected 3rd party artwork property of respective owners.
Coffee cup background for menus: Property of Filippo, http://www.flickr.com/people/fdiotalevi/
Microwave, sandwich, speakers, coffee cup, trashcan, and some other artwork taken from WP Clipart (http://www.wpclipart.com/). Support public domain art!
name: Coffee Time
